a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Paralytic polio: estimated cases by world region, 1980 to 2020
Estimates of the total number of paralytic polio cases, due to wild polioviruses and vaccine-derived polioviruses.
Data source: Adapted from WHO (2020) and Tebbens et al. (2010)
